patthana15.77:1.1: Saraṇaṃ dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.77:2.1: Saraṇaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.77:3.1: Araṇaṃ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naaraṇo nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
